title: My first ambigram
content:
An ambigram of my first name just for fun ;-)  
Not sure if it's legible enough though.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107162122im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ambigram_6038.jpg)
author: ill sans

comments.content:
I am reading _tom_ without looking at your first name on your account.

Good work.

And on another note, the _fi_ in the thread title is kind of annoying me.

Thanks guys!  
I just added the texture to make it a little less 'flat'.  
The fi in the title is indeed looking horrible (especially for a site dedicated to type).

Nice job on working the "o" into other letters. I've seem some ambigrams go real south in that scenario. Very well done for a first. The texture is nice too.

I second the comment on the _fi_ in the thread title.
Not very easy to read, but it is beautiful nonetheless.
i had lot of trouble reading the name, but it's really nice design here

Thanks for the feedback, guys!  
The legibility is indeed a bit off perhaps (as with most ambigrams, I find), but I put aesthetics first, so I'm glad to hear at least I succeeded at that ;-)
